article.text: Clashes between al-Qaida and Yemeni troops leave 17 dead Army push on with offensive in bid to regain control of Zinjibar, a key town in the south of the country Yemeni troops kill al-Qaida militants Yemen says US drone strikes have killed 11 al-Qaida militants in two days Follow events live with our correspondents and a network of selected Twitter users Ssirgany: The Egyptian Coalition for Election Observation press conference on its observation mission, May 22, 12 pm at EOHR office in Manial.
